author: Simon Difford
description: A rum-based variation on the White Lady, with zingy citrus and aromatic maraschino.
name: Casablanca
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
